content: do you have a black thumb then this is the plant for you this crochet flower pot is a fun low maintenance plant that s perfect for adding some colour to your home decor the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * dk weight yarn * 2 5mm crochet hook * card tissue box cereal box etc * 16 gauge floral wire * jewellery pliers * polyester fiberfill * optional toy pellets twine and a charm *yarn needle stitch marker scissors the finished item measure approximately 5 13cm tall item size may vary depending on the materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/crochet-flower-pot/
